ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The aeropalynological analyses are the fruit of the work of a large number of people who have worked in the lab as researchers and students for several years. Only to mention the last contributions, two students of bachelor thesis in Biology have collected and elaborated the pollen data: the focus on Betulaceae was done by Raffaella Ranieri, while that on Poaceae was done by Eleonora Cl√≤, both students at the University of Modena and Reggio Emilia.
